alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:17AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pittsburg County through 545 AM CDT... At 517 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Gerty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haywood... Blanco... Pittsburg... Arpelar... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
